
nodenames_to_nodes(+Graph, +NodeNames, -Nodes)

   Returns the names corresponding to a list of nodes

Arguments
   Graph               a graph structure
   NodeNames           a list of ground data, usually node names
   Nodes               a list of integer node numbers

Type
   library(graph_algorithms)

Description

    

Fail Conditions
   Fails if no node name information is available

See Also
   node_to_nodename / 3, nodename_to_node / 3, nodes_to_nodenames / 3
